So do you like cheese sandwich with garlic ?? Yes, it's easy and succulent breakfast recipe. When you would like to have Cheese Sandwich then add Veggies and cheese it becomes more tasty and people like to have junk food right ðŸ˜‰ Today, I prepared garlic Cheese Sandwich with veggies and spices Nutrition Facts: Mozzarella cheese: Vitamins A, D & B12. Minerals: Calcium, magnesium & protein Garlic : Vitamin C Carrots:Â Vitamins : A, C & B6 Minerals : calcium, iron, magnesium & potassium Capsicum/ Bell pepper:Â Vitamins : A,C & B6 Minerals: Calcium, Iron & magnesium Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Bread slices / Sandwich Bread - Milk/ Brown - 4
  • Mozzarella Cheese - 120 gms
  • Garlic cloves - peeled off - 4 - finely chopped
  • Carrot - Finely chopped - 1/3 cup - 80 gms
  • Capsicum/ Green Bell pepper - 1/3 cup - 80 gms
  • Red chilly flakes - 1/2 tb sp
  • Paprika - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Milk - 2 tb sp
  • Butter - 1 tb sp
Procedure:
  • In a bowl Add cheese, garlic, carrot, bell pepper, salt, Â paprika, red chilly flakes & milk
  • Mix well
  • Get set bread slices and garlic cheese mixture
  • Put garlic cheese mixture on one slice & spread equally
  • Close it with other slice
  • Heat tava add butter
  • Put sandwich & cook both sides equally by applying butter
  • Take off in serving plate
  • Serve it with fresh tomato ketchup or sauce
  • Enjoy cooking, have a nice day ðŸ˜€
